docs.title: Collect the Pricing from Hotels (before 3/27)
docs.text:
Candidate list (can add more later):

Hotel Location Website 喜來登 台北中正區 Room, Venue 喜來登 八里 Main page 將捷酒店 淡水 Room, Venue 福容 淡水 Room, Venue 福容 福隆 Room, Venue 凱達 萬華 Room, Venue 希爾頓 板橋 Room, Venue 凱撒 板橋 Room 威斯汀 大溪 Room, Venue 大板根 三峽 Room, Venue 水美 北投 Room, Venue 六福萬怡 南港 Room, Venue 喜來登 林口 Main page Cozzi 和逸 中壢 (高鐵旁) Room, Venue 名人堂 龍潭 Room, Venue 南方莊園 中壢 Room, Venue 喜來登 竹北 Room, Venue 煙波 新竹 Room, Venue 長榮 礁溪 Room, Venue 老爺 礁溪 Room, Venue

Notes: 1. Audience can clearly see the presentation contents. (at least 3 projector screens?) 2. The place needs to be suitable for kids. 3. Budget: < 350k 4. Ask the pricing for roughly 70-80 people, half twin room, half quad room 5. About dining: 預備桌?

docs.title: Agenda
docs.text:
1. What should be done before the 3 pre-event meetings (籌備會議)?
  2. Potential dates (Late September or Early October)
  3. When should we ask the teachers about their willingness to participate? Whom should we ask?
  4. What kinds of venues are suitable?

docs.title: Summary
docs.text:
1. Discuss the work that needs to be done by late March
  2. Potential dates: 9/22-9/23, 9/29-9/30, 10/6-10/7
  3. Pricing and budget (< 350k hotel + < 50k others)
